name: Bell State Preparation
description: Prepares a Bell state |00⟩ + |11⟩. The ideal outcome is 50% |00⟩ and 50% |11⟩.

name: GHZ State (3-qubit)
description: Prepares a 3-qubit GHZ state |000⟩ + |111⟩. The ideal ⟨ZZZ⟩ expectation value is 1.

name: Mirror Circuit (2-qubit)
description: A mirror circuit that should return to |00⟩. The ideal ⟨ZZ⟩ expectation value is 1.

name: Single-Qubit Circuit
description: A simple H-T-H circuit on one qubit. The ideal ⟨Z⟩ expectation value is −1/√2 ≈ −0.707.
